products.name: Acme Rocket
products.description: A high-speed rocket, perfect for those urgent deliveries. Not recommended for chasing roadrunners.

products.name: Explosive Tennis Balls
products.description: These explosive tennis balls pack a punch. Not intended for recreational tennis games.

products.name: Acme Anvil
products.description: Classic blacksmith's anvil. Exceptionally heavy, may occasionally drop from great heights.

products.name: Invisible Paint
products.description: Paint anything and it becomes invisible! Caution: Effect may be temporary.

products.name: Giant Rubber Band
products.description: A versatile giant rubber band, useful for a variety of surprising situations.

products.name: Portable Hole
products.description: A hole you can take anywhere. Just throw it down and jump in!

products.name: Acme Earthquake Pills
products.description: Consume to cause minor seismic disturbances. Do not swallow.

products.name: Jet-Propelled Pogo Stick
products.description: A traditional pogo stick with a jet engine. Helmet not included.

products.name: Instant Tornado Kit
products.description: Create your own tornado in seconds! For outdoor use only.

products.name: Looney Tunes Character Plushies
products.description: Collect them all! Each sold separately.

products.name: Self-Guided Frisbee
products.description: Never miss your target again with our self-guided frisbee.

products.name: Do-It-Yourself Rocket Sled Kit
products.description: Experience the thrill of rocket-propelled sledding. Some assembly required.

products.name: Boomerang Fishing Rod
products.description: Casts out and retrieves itself. Note: Fish not guaranteed.

products.name: Acme Instant Skywriting Kit
products.description: Write in the sky without a plane! Note: Clear skies recommended.

products.name: Spring-Powered Shoes
products.description: Add a bounce to your step. Great for tall shelves.

products.name: Portable Tunnel
products.description: A tunnel you can paint on any wall. Warning: May not work on all surfaces.

products.name: Acme Disintegrating Pistol
products.description: Perfect for vanishing objects. Note: Objects may not reappear.

products.name: Detachable Rocket Engines
products.description: Add propulsion to any object. Not recommended for use on pets.

products.name: Instant Road Repair Kit
products.description: Fix any road in seconds. Warning: Traffic control not included.

products.name: Looney Tunes Character Figurines
products.description: Your favorite characters in detailed figurine form. Collect them all!
